description: Schema for submitting a target gene.
title: Target

___target_organism.comment: This property is for targets which don't have any associated genes. This property and the "genes" property are mutually exclusive. See organism.json for available identifiers.
___target_organism.title: Target organism

___investigated_as.description: The context(s) the target was investigated in
___investigated_as.title: Target category

___genes.description: List of gene(s) targeted by corresponding assay or antibody.
___genes.comment: See gene.json for available identifiers and details.
___genes.title: Targeted genes

items.description: A gene targeted by corresponding assay or antibody.
items.comment: See gene.json for available identifiers and details.
items.title: Targeted Gene

___modifications.description: List of modifications made to the corresponding gene product of this target.
___modifications.comment: This property will be used to calculate the proper label of the target. See computed_label property for details about automatic label calculation.
___modifications.title: Target modification

items.description: A modification to the gene product.
items.title: Modification

___modification.description: One specific modifications listed in the enum.
___modification.title: Type of modification

___amino_acid_code.description: One letter IUPAC amino acid code.
___amino_acid_code.title: Modified amino acid

___position.description: The numeric position (one based) of modified amino acid in the protein.
___position.comment: It worth noting that the first Methionine on newly transcribed peptide is usually cleaved through N-terminal methionine excision (NME). Therefore, this cleaved Methionine will not be taken into account and the amino acid right after it is position 1.
___position.title: Amino acid position

___dbxref.description: Unique identifiers from external resources (e.g. HGNC, GeneID, UniProtKB or ENSEMBL).
___dbxref.title: External resources

items.description: A unique identifier from external resource (e.g. HGNC, GeneID, UniProtKB or ENSEMBL).
items.comment: Submit as database name:target name (e.g. HGNC:HMFN0395, GeneID:22809)
items.title: External identifier

___label.description: Common name for the target including post-translational modifications, if any.
___label.comment: Submit the common name of the gene with modification (e.g. H3K4me3, eGFP-E2F1, or POLR2AphosphoS2).
___label.title: Target label
